message.content: cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE. The paper focuses on relation extraction and classification in scientific literature, which falls under the domain of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The use of LSTM networks also suggests a focus on deep learning, which could place the paper in cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The task of relation classification also involves information retrieval (IR) and potentially neural networks (NE), which could make these sub-categories relevant as well.
